text:
Over 82,000 children in the age group of less than five years are expected to be immunised in the special polio camps to be held in the corporation limits on February 21. Corporation Commissioner K.R. Selvaraj said that 196 centres would be established and polio drops would be administered by 1,200 children.

Centres would be at Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital, Primary Health Centres in the city, corporation dispensaries, city health offices, ICDS centres, schools, Old Bus Stand, New Bus Stand, Railway Station and other public places.
title: Pulse polio drive
